SEARCH
Package UTILITY

Class EdgeManager

java.lang.Object
UTILITY.EdgeManager
public class EdgeManager extends Object
EdgeManager initializes and manages a list of edges representing the outer edges of hexagonal board. It provides methods to retrieve individual edges and to search for edges based on specific coordinates and trajectories. The initialization involves calculating the coordinates, trajectories, and indices of the edges based on predefined mathematical patterns.

  • Constructor Details

    • EdgeManager

      public EdgeManager()
      Constructs an EdgeManager object and initializes a list of edges. This constructor initializes an EdgeManager object and populates it with a list of edges based on predefined math. Note: The implementation involves mathematical calculations to determine the coordinates, trajectories, and indices of the edges. The resulting list of edges represents the outer edges of the outer hexagons of the board.

  • Method Details

    • getEdge

      public Edge getEdge(int index)
      This method returns the edge object at the specified index in the list of edges.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the edge to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The edge object at the specified index.

    • findEdgeByCoordinateAndTrajectory

      public Edge findEdgeByCoordinateAndTrajectory(Coordinate c, Trajectory t)
      Searches for the unique Edge with the given Coordinate and Trajectory combo. This method searches through the list of edges to find the one that matches the given coordinate and trajectory combination. It compares the coordinate and trajectory of each edge with the specified coordinate and inverted trajectory to find the matching edge.
      Parameters:
      c - The Coordinate to be searched.
      t - The trajectory to be searched.
      Returns:
      Edge The Edge found corresponding to the Coordinate c and Trajectory t.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If no Edge matching the Coordinate and Trajectory is found.
